Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to enacting the "State Police Retention act"
Summary: Enacts the State Police Retention act; provides a deferred retirement option plan payable to members and officers of the division of state police.
LawCode: Add ยง381-c, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to enacting the "State Police Retention act"; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
